sp211.dijkstra module

sp211.dijkstra.shortest_path(graph, base_node)[source]

Implements Dijkstra's algorithm to compute shortest paths from the base_node to all other nodes in the graph.

Parameters:

graph (Graph): The graph object containing nodes and edges. base_node (str): The ID of the starting node.

Returns:
tuple: (costs, previous) where:

costs (dict): node_id -> total cost from base_node previous (dict): node_id -> previous node on the shortest path
